headline: Crown Castle Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Results and Provides Outlook for Full Year 2026
summary: HOUSTON, Feb. 04, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Crown Castle Inc. (NYSE: CCI) ("Crown Castle") today reported results for the full year ended December 31, 2025 and issued its full year 2026 outlook, as reflected in the table below. headline: Crown Castle: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of six analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for funds from operations of $1.07 per share. Funds from operations is a closely watched measure in the REIT industry. It takes net income and adds back items such as depreciation and amortization.

content.title: Crown Castle: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
content.summary: The average estimate of six analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for funds from operations of $1.07 per share. Funds from operations is a closely watched measure in the REIT industry. It takes net income and adds back items such as depreciation and amortization.
